title: Enhancing System Design Practical Competencies: Multimedia Instructional Design for Child Abuse Prevention Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three risk scenarios for child sexual abuse
Learners design preventive education materials utilizing multimedia elements (animations, scenario-based quizzes)

Learners develop a 5-session educational module (programming basics/digital literacy) applicable to real classroom settings (K-12) over 3 weeks. They validate it through peer evaluations (≥3 reviewers) and instructor evaluations (≥4 out of 5 rubric criteria met)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
